arts.sum: There were five games in the Eredivisie on Sunday and below is a round up of all the action. NAC Breda 2-1 Twente Two goals in the opening twenty minutes led NAC Breda to a victory over FC Twente. arts.ttl: Ajax move to within one point of league leaders PSV with 2-0 win over Heerenveen
arts.sum: Ajax capitalised on PSV’s surprising 3-1 loss to PEC Zwolle, reducing the gap at the top of the Eredivisie table to just one point with a 1-0 win over Heerenveen.…

arts.ttl: Roma Close to Signing Rensch: Deal with Ajax in Final Stages
arts.sum: Roma are on the verge of securing a new addition to their squad. The Giallorossi are in the final stages of negotiations with Ajax for the acquisition of Devyne Rensch, a Dutch player born in 2003. Sporting Director Florent Ghisolfi has been working on this deal for weeks, and according to reports, the transfer is now down to the final details. The post Roma Close to Signing Rensch: Deal with Ajax in Final Stages appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Ajax and Celtic transfer target Raúl Moro ruled out for around eight weeks with broken collarbone
arts.sum: Bad news for Ajax and Celtic as Real Valladolid winger Raúl Moro has suffered a serious injury, putting a move this month in doubt. The 22-year-old requires surgery after suffering a…
